narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Ars Treatment Centers, P.c. is a Anesthesiology provider based in Uniontown, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $73.3M in Medicaid payments across 743K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $73.3M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
